steamServicesIssues: Steam services are currently experiencing issues
noOutagesDetected: No outages detected in the last hour
statusPageUrlDesc: URL to open when clicking Status button
refreshIntervalDesc: Minutes between automatic refreshes (0 = manual only)
enableNotificationsDesc: Show notifications when Steam services go down or recover
aboutSteamStatusDesc: Steam Status displays real-time information about Steam services, helping you know when Steam is experiencing issues. Data is fetched from a gateway server that monitors Steam's services.
playersOnlineDesc: Total users currently logged into Steam
webapiDesc: Steam Web API for third-party integrations
historySparklineDesc: A mini graph showing player count trends over the last hour. Helps visualize if Steam is experiencing unusual activity.
connectionManagersStatusDesc: Shows status of Steam Connection Manager servers across 27 regions worldwide. Each region displays its flag, status, and server count. Useful for checking if issues are region-specific.
outageNotificationsDesc: Automatic notifications when Steam services go down. You'll get a one-time alert when an outage is detected, and another when services are restored.
offlineModeDesc: When the gateway is unreachable, the plugin displays the last known status. Look for "(Cached)" indicator to know you're viewing offline data.

disclaimerText3: All Steam status data is provided for informational purposes only. The accuracy of the data depends on the gateway server configuration and availability.
